tasks.task_description: Research and document subscription payment requirements for Indian market compliance
Design subscription data model with billing cycles, trial periods, and cancellation policies
Create marketplace-subscriptions DynamoDB table with subscription lifecycle management
Create marketplace-billing-cycles DynamoDB table for tracking recurring charges
Implement subscription creation API endpoint with trial period support
Implement subscription modification API (upgrade/downgrade plans)
Implement subscription cancellation API with prorated refunds
Create recurring payment scheduler using EventBridge and Lambda
Implement payment retry logic for failed subscription renewals
Create subscription webhook handlers for payment gateway notifications
Implement subscription status management (active, suspended, cancelled, expired)
Create customer billing portal for subscription management
Implement invoice generation and email delivery system
Create subscription analytics and reporting dashboard
Implement dunning management for failed payments
Add subscription entitlement management integration
Create subscription migration tools for existing customers
Implement subscription tax calculation for GST compliance
Add subscription payment reconciliation system
Create comprehensive subscription testing suite

description: Subscription Payment System Implementation - Complete recurring billing, subscription management, and payment gateway integration for CloudNestle Marketplace
